context: The word 'mäletate' is the plural form of the verb 'mäletama' (to remember/recall) in Estonian. It specifically means 'you (plural/formal) remember'. The verb can be conjugated for different persons and tenses, as shown in the examples where we see present tense plural ('mäletate'), past tense plural ('mäletasime'), and negative form ('ei mäleta').
